content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (21 ounce) can cherry pie filling" )

content.text: 1 (16.5 ounce) can pitted dark sweet cherries
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (16.5 ounce) can pitted dark sweet cherries" )
( ing-2 "1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix" )
( ing-4 "3/4 cup butter, cut into pieces" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "375 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "190 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Spray 9x13 baking dish with cooking spray.
2) Dump cherry pie filling into dish and spread evenly.
4) Sprinkle cake mix over the top - DO NOT STIR.
6) Distribute butter pieces evenly over the top.
7) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "the preheated oven"@11:29 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "45 minutes"@34:44 / DUR )
	)
)
